    public class FriendDetailsActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockActivity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener
    This class holds the FriendDetailsActivity. It displays more detailed data from a selected friend, also his/her shared logbookentries.
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View arg0)
        This method will be triggered by clicking a button. It starts the MedalsActivity with additional data like the source of the Intent, and the position of the friend.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and initializes the GUI.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.app.Activity

      • onItemClick

        public void onItemClick(android.widget.AdapterView<?> arg0,
               android.view.View arg1,
               int arg2,
               long arg3)
        This method will be triggered by clicking an item in the ListView. It starts the LogbookEntryDetailsActivity with additional data like the source to remove the edit-button, friendposition and position to determine which LogbookEntry should be displayed.
        Specified by:
        onItemClick in interface android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and loads the userdata from the local database, if the userdata has been deleted by the system.
        Overrides:
        onStart in class android.app.Activity
